message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration of its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an excellent fit for you. Given its high-quality nature and the value it offers, I am offering it to you for $12000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exclusive access and personalized service you will receive. I am confident that this investment will pay off in terms of both functionality and satisfaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you would like to proceed with this offer.
